alert.note: Alert for Ascension; East Baton Rouge; Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 3:52PM CDT until August 02 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South central East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 352 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Walker, or near Denham Springs, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Denham Springs, Gonzales, Walker, Livingston, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Prairieville, Old Jefferson and Shenandoah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 169 and 176. Interstate 12 between mile markers 11 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
